to retain the ribbing pattern original credit cryptious on ravelry and ko-fi please don t republish elsewhere without my consent if found elsewhere this content should be free of charge 2-10 repeat row 1 8 times 11 *k* 12 *p* 13-53 repeat row 11-12 this is stockinette stitch for 11cm if you know your gauge measurements continue 40 times knitting while measuring regularly so you don t have to individually count every row which can be tedious for long pieces cast off i recommend using a stretchy cast off video tutorial linked eyes black yarn make 2 row instruction additional comment number construction place both of the eyes into the correct position on one head segment and pin them down with safety pins to secure their position seam them on with mattress stitch original credit cryptious on ravelry and ko-fi please don t republish elsewhere without my consent if found elsewhere this content should be free of charge seam up 3/4ths of the head leaving the bottom open for stuffing here i ve used a flat slip_stitch seam so i ve placed the segments wrong-side-out to then flip inside out and then stuff don t seam it up yet though seam up 3/4ths of the body don t seam the upper part where the head will connect using mattress stitch note i usually use a flat slip_stitch seam for all pieces i make but for this part specifically i had to use mattress stitch as the legs were too tight to flip inside out when it was done you may need to use something like a knitting needle to properly put the stuffing into the legs as it s quite tight original credit cryptious on ravelry and ko-fi please don t republish elsewhere without my consent if found elsewhere this content should be free of charge using mattress stitch seam the head and body together tie a knot when you re done seaming and weave in the tail seam the edges of the cloak to make a cylinder if you ve made 2 cloak pieces as i have done seam all the edges together and make sure it s even while you re seaming it you can use safety pins to hold it in place clothe that beast and use the same colour of yarn to do a running stitch through the bottom of the ribbing section to make a drawstring cinch it
